replies.msg:
...Determinants of cellular tropism and interaction with the target cell are within the S1 domain, while mediators of membrane fusion have been identified within the S2 domain11,12. Through co-purification with the MERS-CoV S1 domain, Raj and colleagues9 recently identified that dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4, also called CD26) functions as a cellular receptor for MERS-CoV. DPP4 does not share any sequence or structural similarities to the previously identified human coronavirus receptors, such as angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) for SARS-CoV14,15 and HCoV-NL6316, or aminopeptidase N (APN) for HCoV-229E17....

唔知AKI會唔會係呢次最重要的clinical feature🔫

NIH 有個 group 話係 ACE2
佢都有提到 MERS 係用 DPP4

https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2020.01.22.915660v1

replies.msg:
亦都有人講mycophenolic acid有potential 去抑制隻野

chloroquine 睇邊隻啦
e.g. hydroxychloroquine ，即係Plaquenil大把貨。

其實兩隻都係 immunosuppressant
mycophenolic acid 係 anti-metabolite
chloroquine d effects 都幾 broad
係咪唔係好啱用黎 fight infection?

我唔係 pharma / med 底, 唔係好識用藥既野

[Both chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine inhibit antigen presentation in dendritic cells, cytokine production in macrophages, and calcium and Toll-like receptor (TLR) signalling in B, T and other immune cells.]

quote.msg:

replies.msg:
MPA主要食用黎抗排斥
Plaquenil 就主要用黎食rhematological conditions。當然你用黎anti-malarial 都冇問題，當絕對唔係first-line 。人地prophylaxis 人地多數食開第隻。

以前prof.講過：endocrinological signals有屬於佢地嘅Receptor，而foreign substances 就有好多targets e.g. 1st gen antipsychotic


... mycophenolic acid is an inhibitor of cellular inosine monophosphate dehydrogenase, and has antiviral activities against a number of viruses including influenza A. ...

Plaqeunil 就難講啲，但係個outcome應該都係inhibit cytokine storm。

replies.msg:
唔~~ MPA 同 Plaquenil 都會壓抑免疫系統，但係同時又可以制止 viral replication (via diff MoA)，咁係咪即係打個和？因為始終都要個 adaptive immune system 做野先可以清到個 infection？

以前prof.講過：endocrinological signals有屬於佢地嘅Receptor，而foreign substances 就有好多targets e.g. 1st gen antipsychotic


所以成日都覺得 d small molecule 既所謂 targeted therapy 都係唔係真。targeted therapy... drug promiscuity 好似係 norm rather than exception 不過咁樣用黎expand indication 或者 repurposing 又唔錯, e.g. imatinib 搞掂完 CML (Bcr-Abl) 又可以用落 GIST (Kit) 度
